name: Reanimator's Cloak
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Pit Demon Heart" "245171" #L "Necromancer Cloak" "245170" #L "Bio-Comminutor" "154332" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Bio-Comminutor + Pit Demon Heart = #L "Indigo Carmine" "245270" Skills: | CH525 | ------------------------------ Indigo Carmine + Necromancer Cloak = #L "Reanimator's Cloak" "245260" Skills: | CL450 | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Great back item which you can level by right clicking it.
